mainDepartureCity.title: Main Departure City (MDC)
mainDepartureCity.description: Primary departure city/airport code (e.g., TPE for Taipei)

targetCity.title: Target City (TC)
targetCity.description: Final destination city/airport code (e.g., NRT for Tokyo)

alternativeDepartureCities.title: Alternative Departure Cities (ADC)
alternativeDepartureCities.description: Intermediate cities to check for cheaper routes via multi-leg flights

timePeriods.title: Travel Time Periods
timePeriods.description: Date ranges for travel. Each period defines outbound and inbound date ranges.

outboundDateStart.description: Start date for outbound flight search (YYYY-MM-DD)

outboundDateEnd.description: End date for outbound flight search (YYYY-MM-DD)

inboundDateStart.description: Start date for inbound flight search (YYYY-MM-DD)

inboundDateEnd.description: End date for inbound flight search (YYYY-MM-DD)

airlines.title: Filter by Airlines (Optional)
airlines.description: Restrict search to specific airlines. Leave empty for all airlines. Applies to ALL flight legs.

targetLowestPrice.title: Sort by Lowest Price
targetLowestPrice.description: Whether to sort results by price (lowest first)

transferTimeHours.title: Minimum Transfer Time (Hours)
transferTimeHours.description: Minimum hours required between connecting flights for alternative routes

adcBufferHours.title: ADC Search Buffer (Hours)
adcBufferHours.description: Hours buffer for ADC↔TC leg searches (search ±N hours from MDC arrival/departure)

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Limit total number of requests to prevent excessive API calls
